descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Run. Gun. Survive.
Step into the action-packed world of Monster Shooter: Endless Runner, a high-speed VR experience that puts your reflexes, aim, and endurance to the ultimate test. Armed with dual blasters, you're dropped into a monster-infested arena where the only way out... is forward.

Endless Action in VR
Run through ever-changing environments as swarms of creatures hunt you down — all in full VR immersion.

Face Relentless Enemies
From fast crawlers to flying nightmares, every monster type brings new challenges. Learn their patterns and blast your way to survival.

Survive longer, rack up kills, and create a new high score. Can you become the ultimate endless runner?

 Features:

1. Fast-paced arcade gameplay — easy to pick up, hard to master.

2. Endless procedurally generated runs 
3. Smooth performance on Meta Quest 3 & Quest3s.

Built for VR players who love intensity, rhythm, and action, Monster Shooter: Endless Runner delivers pulse-pounding gameplay that never lets up.

Ready to run? The monsters are waiting.
